title: Jeffrey Epstein’s Zorro Ranch to be probed after unanimous vote by New Mexico lawmakers
summary_full: New Mexico lawmakers have unanimously approved a probe into Jeffrey Epstein's Zorro Ranch, creating a special committee to investigate alleged criminal activity. This legislative action coincides with federal efforts to release Epstein-related information, as survivors claim abuse occurred at the ranch. Former state efforts to investigate were previously halted by federal prosecutors.
